name: FlutterLogo
desc: The Flutter logo, in widget form. This widget respects the [IconTheme]. For guidelines on using the Flutter logo, visit https://flutter.dev/brand.

fields.name: size
fields.desc: The size of the logo in logical pixels.

fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: The color used to paint the "Flutter" text on the logo, if [style] is [FlutterLogoStyle.horizontal] or [FlutterLogoStyle.stacked].

fields.name: style
fields.desc: Whether and where to draw the "Flutter" text. By default, only the logo itself is drawn.

fields.name: duration
fields.desc: The length of time for the animation if the [style] or [textColor] properties are changed.

fields.name: curve
fields.desc: The curve for the logo animation if the [style] or [textColor] change.
